001package io.github.ai4ci.util;
002
003import java.io.Serializable;
004import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong;
005import java.util.function.DoubleUnaryOperator;
006
007/**
008 * A small atomic holder for a double value.
009 *
010 * <p>
011 * This class provides atomic get/set and update operations for a double value
012 * by storing the raw long bits used by {@link Double} and delegating to an
013 * {@link java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong}. It mirrors the behaviour of
014 * atomic numeric holders but for double primitives and is useful when a single
015 * concurrently updated double is required.
016 * </p>
017 *
018 * <p>
019 * Downstream uses: see {@link io.github.ai4ci.util.AtomicDoubleArray} for an
020 * array based variant and
021 * {@link io.github.ai4ci.util.SparseDecomposition.SparseMatrix} which interacts
022 * with atomic double arrays in matrix multiplication.
023 * </p>
024 *
025 * @author Rob Challen
026 */
027public class AtomicDouble implements Serializable {
028
029        private static final long serialVersionUID = 0L;
030
031        /**
032         * Create an AtomicDouble from the given long bits. This is used when
033         * deserialising
034         *
035         * @param l the long bits representing the double value
036         * @return an AtomicDouble initialized with the double value represented by
037         *         the given long bits
038         */
039        protected static AtomicDouble fromLong(long l) {
040                var bits = new AtomicLong(l);
041                return new AtomicDouble(bits);
042        }
043
044        private transient AtomicLong bits;
045
046        /**
047         * Create an AtomicDouble initialised to zero.
048         */
049        public AtomicDouble() {
050                this(0.0);
051        }
052
053        private AtomicDouble(AtomicLong bits) {
054                this.bits = bits;
055        }
056
057        /**
058         * Create an AtomicDouble with the given initial value.
059         *
060         * @param initialValue the initial double value
061         */
062        public AtomicDouble(double initialValue) {
063                this.bits = new AtomicLong(Double.doubleToRawLongBits(initialValue));
064        }
065
066        /**
067         * Atomically add the given delta to the current value and return the updated
068         * value.
069         *
070         * @param delta the amount to add
071         * @return the updated value after the addition
072         */
073        public final double addAndGet(double delta) {
074                while (true) {
075                        var current = this.bits.get();
076                        var currentVal = Double.longBitsToDouble(current);
077                        var nextVal = currentVal + delta;
078                        var next = Double.doubleToRawLongBits(nextVal);
079                        if (this.bits.compareAndSet(current, next)) { return nextVal; }
080                }
081        }
082
083        /**
084         * Atomically compare and set the value.
085         *
086         * @param expect the expected current value
087         * @param update the new value to set if the current value equals expect
088         * @return true if successful, false otherwise
089         */
090        public final boolean compareAndSet(double expect, double update) {
091                return this.bits.compareAndSet(
092                                Double.doubleToRawLongBits(expect),
093                                Double.doubleToRawLongBits(update)
094                );
095        }
096
097        /**
098         * Get the current value.
099         *
100         * @return the current double value
101         */
102        public final double get() {
103                return Double.longBitsToDouble(this.bits.get());
104        }
105
106        /**
107         * Atomically add the given delta to the current value and return the
108         * previous value.
109         *
110         * @param delta the amount to add
111         * @return the previous value before the addition
112         */
113        public final double getAndAdd(double delta) {
114                while (true) {
115                        var current = this.bits.get();
116                        var currentVal = Double.longBitsToDouble(current);
117                        var nextVal = currentVal + delta;
118                        var next = Double.doubleToRawLongBits(nextVal);
119                        if (this.bits.compareAndSet(current, next)) { return currentVal; }
120                }
121        }
122
123        /**
124         * Atomically set to the given value and return the old value.
125         *
126         * @param newValue the new double value
127         * @return the previous value
128         */
129        public final double getAndSet(double newValue) {
130                return Double.longBitsToDouble(
131                                this.bits.getAndSet(Double.doubleToRawLongBits(newValue))
132                );
133        }
134
135        /**
136         * Atomically apply the provided update function and return the previous
137         * value.
138         *
139         * <p>
140         * The update function is applied to the current value and its result is
141         * swapped in when the underlying bits have not changed concurrently.
142         * </p>
143         *
144         * @param updateFunction function to compute the new value from the current
145         *                       value
146         * @return the previous value
147         */
148        public final double getAndUpdate(DoubleUnaryOperator updateFunction) {
149                while (true) {
150                        var current = this.bits.get();
151                        var currentVal = Double.longBitsToDouble(current);
152                        var nextVal = updateFunction.applyAsDouble(currentVal);
153                        var next = Double.doubleToRawLongBits(nextVal);
154                        if (this.bits.compareAndSet(current, next)) { return currentVal; }
155                }
156        }
157
158        /**
159         * Eventually set to the given value.
160         *
161         * <p>
162         * This is a weaker form of {@link #set(double)} that may not be immediately
163         * visible to other threads.
164         * </p>
165         *
166         * @param newValue the new double value
167         */
168        public final void lazySet(double newValue) {
169                this.bits.lazySet(Double.doubleToRawLongBits(newValue));
170        }
171
172        private void readObject(java.io.ObjectInputStream s)
173                        throws java.io.IOException, ClassNotFoundException {
174                s.defaultReadObject();
175                this.bits = new AtomicLong(Double.doubleToRawLongBits(s.readDouble()));
176        }
177
178        /**
179         * Set to the given value.
180         *
181         * @param newValue the new double value
182         */
183        public final void set(double newValue) {
184                this.bits.set(Double.doubleToRawLongBits(newValue));
185        }
186
187        /**
188         * Return a string representation of the current value.
189         *
190         * @return the string form of the current double value
191         */
192        @Override
193        public String toString() {
194                return Double.toString(this.get());
195        }
196
197        /**
198         * Atomically apply the provided update function and return the updated
199         * value.
200         *
201         * @param updateFunction function to compute the new value from the current
202         *                       value
203         * @return the updated value
204         */
205        public final double updateAndGet(DoubleUnaryOperator updateFunction) {
206                while (true) {
207                        var current = this.bits.get();
208                        var currentVal = Double.longBitsToDouble(current);
209                        var nextVal = updateFunction.applyAsDouble(currentVal);
210                        var next = Double.doubleToRawLongBits(nextVal);
211                        if (this.bits.compareAndSet(current, next)) { return nextVal; }
212                }
213        }
214
215        private void writeObject(java.io.ObjectOutputStream s)
216                        throws java.io.IOException {
217                s.defaultWriteObject();
218                s.writeDouble(this.get());
219        }
220}
